description._content: Image Description from historic lecture booklet: "This cooperative was started in 1894. Now it handles pigs for 4500 members. There are about 50 of these which represent 70 percent of the pig-breeding farmers and about 75 percent of the total stock of pigs. They slaughter about 82 percent of the pigs which enter in the bacon export trade." Original Collection: Visual Instruction Department Lantern Slides Item Number: P217:set 067 015 You can find this image by searching for the item number by clicking here. Want more?
